item.title: On Version Numbers
item.description: The other day I got a question from a principal software architect: can they open a single Merge Request (Pull Request in GitHub terms) for multiple git repositories? He drew two scenarios: When they have a fundamental change in their gradle configs, they have to change in every repository If there is an API change, they have to modify the code at multiple places at the same time. This is a very large repo coming from ClearCase, and it compiles for several hours.
